detaileddescription.para: A and B are orthogonal signals, Z is zero pulse
A is speed pulse, B is directional pulse, Z not used
A is forward pulse, B is reverse pusle, Z not used

briefdescription.para: QEO set resolution lines for wave mode.
QEO set output type for wave mode.
QEO set saddle type for wave mode.

parameterdescription.para: true for standard saddle, false for triangular wave stacking

briefdescription.para: QEO set phase shift for wave mode.
QEO enable vd vq inject and select vq vq source for wave mode.

parameterdescription.para: false for vd vq data from clc module, true for vd vq from software inject register

briefdescription.para: QEO disable vd vq inject for wave mode.
QEO config vd vq value when vd vq from register.
QEO load vd vq inject value when vd vq from register.
QEO enable amplitude for wave mode.
QEO disable amplitude for wave mode.
QEO set mid point shift for wave mode.

memberdef.argsstring: (QEOV2_Type *base, uint8_t index, uint32_t limit0, uint32_t limit1)
memberdef.name: qeo_wave_set_max_limit

briefdescription.para: QEO set max limmit for wave mode.

memberdef.argsstring: (QEOV2_Type *base, uint8_t index, uint32_t limit0, uint32_t limit1)
memberdef.name: qeo_wave_set_min_limit

briefdescription.para: QEO set min limmit for wave mode.
QEO set deadzone shift for wave mode.
QEO wave set pwm cycle.

simplesect.para: when cycle is 0, output value is 0 - 0xFFFFFFFF, others, output value is 0 - cycle

briefdescription.para: QEO get wave output value.
QEO wave get defalut mode config.
QEO wave config mode.
QEO set resolution lines for ABZ mode.
QEO set phase shift for three phase output mode.
QEO set offset for output signal in ABZ mode.
QEO set max frequency for ABZ mode.
QEO set wdog frequency for ABZ mode.
QEO disable wdog for ABZ mode.
QEO config reverse edge for ABZ mode.

parameterdescription.para: true for reverse edge point speed pulse's negedge false for reverse edge point between speed pulse's posedge and negedge, min period dedicated by the num line_width

simplesect.para: take effect when ABZ work on qeo_abz_output_pulse_revise mode

briefdescription.para: QEO ABZ get default mode config.
QEO ABZ config mode.
QEO ABZ mode enable output.
QEO ABZ mode disable output.
QEO ABZ mode enable and configure position sync mode.

parameterdescription.para: true: sync identical posistion; false: sync step of position

briefdescription.para: QEO ABZ mode get default zero pulse output mode.
QEO ABZ mode configure zero pulse output mode.
QEO set resolution lines for PWM mode.
QEO set phase shift for PWM mode.
QEO PWM mode enable output.
QEO PWM mode disable output.
QEO PWM check if it is triggered by hardware to enter safety mode.

simplesect.para: This bit is only valid if the hardware trigger source has not been cleared

briefdescription.para: QEO PWM select phase table.

parameterdescription.para: true for using positive phase table, false for using negative phase table

briefdescription.para: QEO PWM enter safety mode by software.

simplesect.para: call qeo_pwm_software_exit_safety to exit safety mode

briefdescription.para: QEO PWM exit safety mode by software.
QEO PWM get default mode config.
QEO PWM config mode.
QEO PWM get default safety table.
QEO PWM get default phase table.
QEO PWM config safety table.
QEO PWM onfig phase table.
QEO enable software position inject.
QEO software inject position.
QEO disable software position inject, QEO will using position from hardware.
QEO check calculate finish status.
